channel.title: Alcazar™ RSPS Solution
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i55.tinypic.com/jheft3.jpg[/img]
[url=http://alcazar.freesmfhosting.com/index.php/topic,3.0.html][img]http://i53.tinypic.com/33dwd8g.jpg[/img][/url]
[b]The Begining of an Introduction to Alcazar[/b]
Alcazar Development thread started today letting you know theyre is something epic coming your way, giving members of Moparscape an Adventure of a lifetime.With monsters to kill, quests to complete and mythical cities to explore also help Citizens find there deeds by helping them solve a problem such as a quest unlocking new items and making a living off rewards.Take your risk by claiming clue scrolls and gathering pieces of information letting it take place of an adventure to begin and find your treasure to and feel the gaming experience but for now you shall need no client you can use either silabsoft or Moparscape. Alcazar has a great system producing a great economy with great foundation procedures, high stability and fragile account safety, talk to your citizen bankers of Alcazar to create your passcode for safety currency of belongings. Gather your items earn your reputation by finding and facing your enemy on a 1v1 combat at edgeville wilderness but think again Alcazar brings you breathless dragons and rattage in varrock city so be sure to take youre risk!
[b]Update 7/04/11 - Tutorial Island Started-[/b] As you begin you face the runescape guide in the tutorial island of Alcazar, which gives you and teaches you the basics all about it.Here you can face artifical skills and make new freinds before you join the ultimate adventure so you learn the knowlege of how to play here.Learn your fishing,mining,smithing and cooking skills here so you cant go wrong! [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/243rkfm.jpg[/img]
[b]Survival Expert 7/04/11[/b] Ask your survival expert on her own knowlege on how to survive in the wild by keeping warm by burning your logs, catching your own kill to eat or also makeing your GP raise in value to make a living. [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/2ep0six.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i54.tinypic.com/2upv6mp.jpg[/img]
[b]Master chef's basics[/b] Cook your kill or bake your cake learn the basics off the master chef and learn a few tricks indeed with a culture and a passion he sure loves, you can make lots of coins from cooking and fishing as people will allways need food to eat or use for quests and clues. [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/eb5zde.jpg[/img]
[b]Vannaks house Warming[/b] Come face to face with the combat expert of them all and learn from the best on how to fight monsters and be an epic ultimate combat master let him show you the way as he offers you all his knowlege and some of his wears. [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/2mhiic7.jpg[/img]
[b]Magic Experts Valocity[/b] As you talk your way through with the magic expert he offers and endulges with specific mystical and magical words very tornting due to the process he gathers and finds you spare runes to guide you magic experience, he vanquishes you into the depths of the main land from here your on your own! [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/wufc4o.jpg[/img]
[b]Update 8/04/11 - Tazaar Moves in[/b] The big bad Jad has come to compound his lava land and vanquish any who trys to beneath him, so you think your brace enough to control and own jad in sequence and claim the powerful firecape misted through lava and claim the compound victory!In tazaat depths it reveals many other beasts which drop rare and strong items so maybe you can become reflected to this and make GP.
[b]Vast Department[/b] [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/2l8b48m.jpg[/img]
[b]Tazaar-Ket[/b] [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/dbscj.jpg[/img]
[b]Lumbridge Guides Benefit[/b] As people know Alcazar is a huge region so players do tend to get lost in cities so simply talk to your fellow Guide ,sit back and let him encounter on where your going wrong.Believe me hes got a few tricks up his sleeves for vast areas! [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/2l9tm4z.jpg[/img][/center]

item.title: Alcazar™ RSPS Solution
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

If you want to completely re-create tutorial island I suggest you use proper grammar/punctuation. Always capitalize the pronoun “I”, as it is a single word, when words are left alone as “I” usually is left alone it should be capitalized.

Also, when you start a sentence the first words should usually have a comma. The words such as

Here
Hello there
Also
Have this
No
Yes
Hello
Welcome
Hi
etc, should have comma’s when you start the sentence.

Read full topic

item.title: Alcazar™ RSPS Solution
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

[quote=“noobs are ftw, post:11, topic:389837”][quote author=Kono-chan link=topic=485745.msg3559498#msg3559498 date=1302142679]

I’m pretty sure you stole that banner from our project (RS-Reborn), edited it a little (crappily), and while I wish you good luck, I do hope you pick a different banner.

lmfao i didnt even pay attention to his banner XD

How can you not? It’s so horribly edited. He took our banned that I took from Jagrerx (lolwut) and put his name on there with a few rares. Couldn’t even put his name on there without whiting out half of the sword…
[/quote]

i went straight to the text i dont care for banners much[/quote]

Not really a banner person myself… It was just so ugly I couldn’t not see it.

Read full topic
